clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Major vessels show normal waveform on Doppler.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Gallbladder shows hyperechoic, no stones or wall thickening.
Uterus appears hyperechoic; endometrial thickness measures 17.24 mm.
Right kidney demonstrates normal, no hydronephrosis.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 18.26 bpm.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
